attributes.action: Reveal what Gulf War soldiers were vaccinated with
attributes.additional_details: They do not know what they were injected with, they do not know the side effects and most importantly, it was never registered in their medical history. It is important to know what is being injected into ones body and more importantly it’s important to know the side effects of said injection
attributes.background: Reveal what Gulf War soldiers were injected with

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Information has already been released by the Government - you can find links to these in this response

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/757580/04014.pdf
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
